datasets.name: UCI Credit Approval
datasets.description: Classic UCI dataset for credit card application approvals. 690 instances with 15 features including credit history, employment, and prior defaults.

datasets.name: German Credit (Statlog)
datasets.description: 1000 credit applicants classified as good or bad credit risk. Includes checking account status, credit history, purpose of loan, savings, employment duration, and personal information.

datasets.name: Taiwan Credit Card Default
datasets.description: 30,000 credit card clients from Taiwan (2005). Includes payment history, bill amounts, demographics. Target: default payment next month.
